item.title: T-tests: Regression and mean value
item.description: I have been asked by students about the difference between the “normal” t-test for mean value analysis and the “regression” t-test many times. So, is there any difference? Let’s look the following example to get a practical intuition: We will use the mtcars dataset to test whether cars with manual transmission have different fuel consumption than cars with automatic transmission. library(dplyr) data("mtcars") boxplot(mtcars$cyl ~ mtcars$am) mtcars %>% group_by(am) %>% summarise(mpgAvg = mean(mpg)) ## # A tibble: 2 x 2 ## am mpgAvg ## <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 0 17.
